page.title: 14Farm Visit
page.content: Robert, Nathan and I went to a farm in Throcking it is called "W M Lower Farm". It is quite a large farm - about 500 acres.It has 3,000 hens and about 2_3 hundred pheasant chicks. The pheasants chicks will be let loose for shooting.It also has 48 cattle.These cattle are three breeds: Belted Galloway,Charolais,Ayrshire. To milk his cattle Mr.Murchie uses a modern milking machine.Altogether the cows give 461 litres per day. Mr.Murchie also grows crops.He grows Wheat,Barley,Oats,Rape and grass for silage. We asked Mr.Murchie his fuel consumption. He said about 3gls per hr per vehicle.
